channel.title: I need a new hobby
channel.description:
I'm bored as shit. School ain't a challenge for me, although I do like the work I'll be doing later on. I 'learned' my attitude on my previous school. I could easily do it without learning, and it's the same on this school. Why put in any effort to get 9's or higher, when you can get 6-7's without doing shit. My current/previous hobby's piss me off so I'm looking for a new one, but I've ran out of idea's.
My previous hobby's: Football (soccer) Tennis Boxing Guitar
I currently play the guitar. I started about a year ago, but during the summer holiday's I didn't play at all. I had about 10 weeks vacation, so after that I couldn't play anything anymore. But my guitar teacher doesn't care and wants to continue with year 2. I can't be bothered to start all over again, and after 5 mins of playing I get so pissed off I just want to throw my guitar away. Of course I won't do that, because that thing's still worth a penny.
I don't want a hobby that costs a shitload of money to start off, and then turns out to be shit. I don't have much patience, which is my main problem. If I can't do something really fast, I get bored/pissed off and stop bothering. Playing the Piano/keyboard sounds nice, but it's a creative thing like playing the guitar, and I doubt it will get me anywhere.
So yea, I'm pissed off at the moment and I need to vent my anger/get new ideas.

item.title: I need a new hobby
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Do drugs
Also, go bike riding. It’s good exercise and it’s fun to be able to go long distances.

item.title: I need a new hobby
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:6, topic:245836”]Ice hockey!

I used to be in a team and went training twice a week and had regular matches, loved it. Something happened, which even i’m not too sure of and here i am - doing nothing but staying inside playing games all day.[/quote]

Am I the only one on these forums that plays hockey? (:() Trust me, it’s extremely entertaining and it takes time and practice to get rather good at it. If you have time to waste, and a pair of skates, I suggest starting to go to ice rinks if you can to get better at skating to start off (if you have rinks in the netherlands?) and then move on from there.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a new hobby
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’m bored as shit. School ain’t a challenge for me, although I do like the work I’ll be doing later on. I ‘learned’ my attitude on my previous school. I could easily do it without learning, and it’s the same on this school. Why put in any effort to get 9’s or higher, when you can get 6-7’s without doing shit. My current/previous hobby’s piss me off so I’m looking for a new one, but I’ve ran out of idea’s.

My previous hobby’s:
Football (soccer)
Tennis
Boxing
Guitar

I currently play the guitar. I started about a year ago, but during the summer holiday’s I didn’t play at all. I had about 10 weeks vacation, so after that I couldn’t play anything anymore. But my guitar teacher doesn’t care and wants to continue with year 2. I can’t be bothered to start all over again, and after 5 mins of playing I get so pissed off I just want to throw my guitar away. Of course I won’t do that, because that thing’s still worth a penny.

I don’t want a hobby that costs a shitload of money to start off, and then turns out to be shit. I don’t have much patience, which is my main problem. If I can’t do something really fast, I get bored/pissed off and stop bothering. Playing the Piano/keyboard sounds nice, but it’s a creative thing like playing the guitar, and I doubt it will get me anywhere.

So yea, I’m pissed off at the moment and I need to vent my anger/get new ideas.
